title: Walking in Paris - paraphrases "...your last home"

content.question: Which of the following best paraphrases the meaning of line 16, “not knowing I would be your last home”?

choices.label: Nana’s letters were intended for her family at home.
Nana’s letters were unappreciated until the speaker read them.
The speaker now provides a figurative home for Nana’s memories.
The speaker now lives in a home like Nana’s.

content.answer: The speaker now provides a figurative home for Nana’s memories.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
